skins.shipDescription: Sims-class Destroyer - Hammann, Hull Number DD-412!
skins.selfIntroduction: What are you looking at? Hammann is Hammann! Yorktown? I've never regretted trying to save her! I don't need your pity! Hmph! ... But... thank you...
skins.acquisition: Hey! Don't stare at me like such an idiot, you pervert! ... I'm cute? Did you really think just complimenting me would make me happy? You moron!
skins.login: How long were you going to keep me waiting?! Being alone feels so... Hmph!
skins.details: You pervert! What are you staring at?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Get ready for punishment if you open the window!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I-168's been here, hasn't she? I'll teach her a lesson!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Why won't you talk to me?
skins.secretaryTouch: I don't want you touching me, you pervert!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: (Picks up phone) Hello, is this Military Police? Yes, this Commander is a pervert and he...

skins.shipDescription: I'm just wearing new clothes, so why should I have to raise my skirt like this? Huh? You want me to look more upset? You... you pervert!
skins.acquisition: I'm just wearing new clothes, so why should I have to raise my skirt like this? Huh? You want me to look more upset? You... you pervert!
skins.login: You're a full-blown pervert beyond saving if just seeing these clothes makes you so excited!
skins.details: How long are you going to keep looking... I want to go see how Yorktown is doing...
skins.secretaryIdle2: As long as you promise to work hard, I'll stay with you for just a little longer... I guess?

skins.shipDescription: I'm not really happy at all! But since you're bonding with me for once, I have to say... thank y... H-hmph! I didn't say anything!
skins.acquisition: I'm not really happy at all! But since you're bonding with me for once, I have to say... thank y... H-hmph! I didn't say anything!
skins.details: A-are you staring at my swimsuit...? Hmph! J-just for today I'll let you worship me!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I never said it was okay to just ignore me!
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you like beach volleyball so much then go play with Cygnet instead of me! Hmph!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey, stupid Commander, who are you looking at?! Y-you should be looking at me...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *Eek* ... Yorktown, I-I can't hold the commander back anymore...

skins.JPClientName: ポニデレ?キャッツンイヤ`
skins.shipDescription: Hmph! I'm only here because you pleaded so desperately for me to come! Don't get any funny ideas! ...Why did I take so long to pick out my clothes? It... it's not like I was trying to impress anyone! I definitely wasn't looking forward to this party or anything!
skins.acquisition: Hmph! I'm only here because you pleaded so desperately for me to come! Don't get any funny ideas! ...Why did I take so long to pick out my clothes? It... it's not like I was trying to impress anyone! I definitely wasn't looking forward to this party or anything!
skins.login: Commander, how long do you plan to keep me waiting?! Um... It, it's not like I went out of my way to show up early or anything!
skins.details: How long do you plan to keep staring... The party's going to end at this rate! You dummy!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Woah... This is the first time I've seen Yorktown like that... Is she going to be okay?
skins.secretaryIdle2: That Sims... I bet she's hiding somewhere waiting to pull a prank on me... Commander, m-make sure to protect me!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Iroha is here as well?! ...Wh-whatever! Since I'm here with the commander, I'll let her slide this time!
skins.secretaryTouch: E-even if we're dancing, I won't forgive you if you touch any weird places!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hello, naval police? Yes, it's that commander again, this time at the party...

skins.shipDescription: Ughh... These gloves are so heavy and the dress is too revealing. Why on earth did I decide to put these on... I can't show myself to Yorktown like this!
skins.acquisition: Ughh... These gloves are so heavy and the dress is too revealing. Why on earth did I decide to put these on... I can't show myself to Yorktown like this!
skins.details: Stop staring at me already, stupid Commander! ...You need to, or you can't evaluate my dancing? Well... stop staring anyway!
skins.secretaryIdle1: This attachable tail can move? Really, huh... And why do you know that?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hah, aren't these cat ears just the cutest? I thought so.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Eldridge's costume looks easier to move about in... N-no, I don't wanna try it, you stupid perv!
skins.secretaryTouch: You want me to shake fans' hands? With these bulky paws?

skins.shipDescription: I-I'm nobody's surprise! Ugh, I should've never listened to Sims... Stop staring already and undo these ribbons around my arms!
skins.acquisition: I-I'm nobody's surprise! Ugh, I should've never listened to Sims... Stop staring already and undo these ribbons around my arms!
skins.login: I'll do it myself! Hngghh! *pant*... I-I can't do it after all... Stop being useless and help me out!
skins.details: Wh-what do you think?! Like I'd ever agree to be turned into a present! It's just... I didn't know what else to give you for Christmas...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Just how long are you gonna keep me like this, you half-witted commander?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmph! You're not gonna get any work done without me helping you!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I haven't given Yorktown my present yet... I can't just be stuck like this all day!
skins.secretaryTouch: G-give me some space, you idiot! ...N-no, that doesn't mean I'm telling you to stay away!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You're really exploiting the fact that I can't move... I'm never, ever forgiving you for this!
